title: Kris Smith cuts a dapper figure as he launches of Fashions on the Field ahead of the Melbourne Cup
text:
He is one of Australia's most in demand male models.

And Kris Smith put on his dapper best for the launch of Fashions on the Field at the Victorian Racing Club in Flemington on Wednesday.

The father-of-two, 41, dressed for the event in a light blue tailored blazer with a paisley shirt and a navy neck tie.

Race day ready! Kris Smith put on a dapper display at the launch of Fashions on the Field at the Victorian Racing Club in Flemington on Wednesday

He completed his look with chinos and suede tassel slippers.

Kris' handsome appearance at the launch comes after he gifted his girlfriend Sarah Boulazeris a bouquet of flowers to mark their two-year anniversary.

Unfortunately for the Myer ambassador, Sarah forgot all about their special date and did not return the favour.

Dapper: The father-of-two, 41, dressed for the event in a light blue, tailored blazer with a paisley shirt and a navy neck tie

Kris captioned the video, 'Oh these brownie points will be enjoyable.... good memory baby!' along with the hashtags: #anniversary #sheforgot and #ididnt.

The Salford-born model couldn't have been any happier with himself, pumping his fists in the air as his partner laughed in embarrassment.

Kris and Sarah have been dating since 2017, and became the proud parents to their first child together - daughter Mila Elle - in December 2018.

Oh dear: Kris' handsome appearance at the launch comes after he gifted his girlfriend Sarah Boulazeris a bouquet of flowers to mark their two-year anniversary. Unfortunately for the Myer ambassador, Sarah forgot all about their special date and did not get him anything

The couple have not yet shared the gender of their unborn baby.

They are expecting their bundle of joy on December 19.

Kris also shares an eight-year-old son, Ethan, with former girlfriend Dannii Minogue, who he dated from 2008 to 2012.
